sentences.en: The sash, kimono, and other garments were made to fit a child.
sentences.cn: 这些腰带、和服和其他衣服都做得适合孩子穿。

sentences.en: The kimono had to be picked up at the boutique.
sentences.cn: 但必须亲自去到那家专卖店才能拿到和服。

sentences.en: Sometimes later, I found a photo of a rock star dressed in a Kimono.
sentences.cn: 后来，我看到一张摇滚明星身着和服的照片。
